casebody.data:
PATEL
v.
STANLEY WORKS CUSTOMER SUPPORT. No. 445P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2006. Charles G. Monnett, III, Charlotte, for Patel.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of August 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2006."
